snippet.title: Horse Runner DX - Demo Trailer | Available Now on Steam!
snippet.description:
👉 Play the demo and wishlist on Steam now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3407670/Horse_Runner_DX_Demo

The demo of Horse Runner DX is now live on Steam! 🐎 Get ready for fast-paced action in a frustration-free, pixel-perfect platformer, where you don’t just control a single horse, but an entire herd! 🌟

Jump into this wholesome adventure with tight controls and roguelite elements—perfect for retro game lovers and anyone looking for straightforward, fun gameplay! 🎮✨

Available for Windows, Linux, and Steam Deck! 🚀
